channel.title: Computer Vision on Alex de Siqueira
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on Alex de Siqueira

item.title: mothra
item.description: Mothra analyzes images of lepidopterans — mainly butterfles and moths — and measures their wing lengths. Using binarization techniques and calculating the resolution of ruler ticks, we read in images of lepidopterans and output the millimiter lengths of their wings.
